body:
Hi Alejandro,

We hope that somewhere during 2015 (Mostapha may know more), [Butterfly](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/update-happy-yalda) project will be completed which will bring the cfd to the Ladybug+Honeybee. At the moment some users succeeded (I didn't check this personally) in using Geco/Ecotect/WinAir combination to import cfd analysis data from Ecotect to Grasshopper. Please check these [two](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/cfd-in-ghecotect-02?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A168433&xg_source=activity) [pages](https://wewanttolearn.wordpress.com/2011/10/12/computational-fluid-dynamic-cfd-using-winair-for-ecotect/) for further explanations. To my knowledge there are no Grasshopper plugins/components for importing Ansys, SolidWorks, NX... cfd results to Grasshopper, at least at the moment.
